mapper.select: SELECT u.*, r.id AS role_id, r.name AS role_name, r.code AS role_code, r.description AS role_description, r.status AS role_status, p.id AS permission_id, p.name AS permission_name, p.code AS permission_code, p.description AS permission_description, p.type AS permission_type, p.parent_id AS permission_parent_id, p.path AS permission_path, p.icon AS permission_icon, p.sort AS permission_sort, p.status AS permission_status FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id AND ur.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id AND r.is_deleted = 0 AND r.status = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON r.id = rp.role_id AND rp.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id AND p.is_deleted = 0 AND p.status = 1 WHERE u.username = #{username} AND u.is_deleted = 0 AND u.status = 1

SELECT u.*, r.id AS role_id, r.name AS role_name, r.code AS role_code, r.description AS role_description, r.status AS role_status, p.id AS permission_id, p.name AS permission_name, p.code AS permission_code, p.description AS permission_description, p.type AS permission_type, p.parent_id AS permission_parent_id, p.path AS permission_path, p.icon AS permission_icon, p.sort AS permission_sort, p.status AS permission_status FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id AND ur.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id AND r.is_deleted = 0 AND r.status = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON r.id = rp.role_id AND rp.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id AND p.is_deleted = 0 AND p.status = 1 WHERE u.id = #{id} AND u.is_deleted = 0 AND u.status = 1

SELECT DISTINCT p.id AS permission_id, p.name AS permission_name, p.code AS permission_code, p.description AS permission_description, p.type AS permission_type, p.parent_id AS permission_parent_id, p.path AS permission_path, p.icon AS permission_icon, p.sort AS permission_sort, p.status AS permission_status FROM sys_permission p JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id AND rp.is_deleted = 0 JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id AND ur.is_deleted = 0 WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND p.is_deleted = 0 AND p.status = 1 AND p.type = 1 ORDER BY p.parent_id, p.sort ASC
